overview: Aldy, a university student, has a girlfriend, Dewi, a model, who values her career over him and then breaks up with him. Aldy, is disappointed, fails his test, becomes frustrated and starts dating other girls. One day, Aldy rescues Dini from a robbery. They fall in love with each other and cheer each other on to study harder. When their relationship is going smoothly, Dewi returns from abroad and wants to get back with Aldy. Aldy refuses so Dewi becomes frustrated and starts tormenting them.
title: When Love Has Passed
